title: Profile Hextech Chests
body: How do you open the hextech chests from the profile?

replies.body:
If you're referring to the Hextech Chests that appear on your profile page, you will need to get an S grade (including S+ and S-) in order to unlock it in your loot, which you will then be able to open using a Hextech Key. You'll be able to unlock 1 Hextech chest per champion, and will gain another "chest unlock" each week, up to a maximum of 4.

If you're referring to chests you've unlocked by receiving an S grade, you will need to go to the "Loot" tab (located in the upper right of the client, just to the left of the "Store" tab) and use a Hextech Key to unlock it.
Rip one-tricks like me who have to wait a whole year before they can get another chest T_T
Just an FYI, if you queue with someone who then get's an S grade, you will receive the chest for the champion you were playing. I feel like I probably should have mentioned that in my previous post.
Or if you really want another chest that badly just play another champ, you're gonna have to at some point if eve gets banned
I just dodge unless I'm in promos. Then it's basically a free loss.
So you make everyone else wait longer just because you refuse to play anything else, that seems like a dick move to me.
Dodging is a legitimate climbing strategy. There are lots of videos on it and even high elo players endorse it.

Doesn't matter if it's "legit" or not I wouldn't want to have to keep waiting for a game because some silly one-trick won't play any of the 140+ other champions in the game. There's a difference between dodging because someone is being really toxic in champ select and will probably troll the game, and someone with a tendency to be extremely stubborn when it comes to playing more then one champ in a game that's literally about champion diversity. I guarantee (especially for bronze 5 players) that if you can play at least 2 champions in every lane well, you will climb faster then trying to play eve jungle every single match (or attempting to play her in lane which is retarded).

> I guarantee (especially for bronze 5 players) that if you can play at least 2 champions in every lane well, you will climb faster then trying to play eve jungle every single match

Entirely wrong, If you want to climb it's best to main 1 single role, and if you get autofilled or even secondary role you should dodge. 
For whatever division you're at, you're there for a reason. - Players in the role you don't main will inevitably be better than you and there's a good chance you will get facerolled/feed - Resulting in a high chance of losing. 

Dodging = -3 lp
Playing off role = +- 14-20LP and this isn't 50/50 every game. 
 
If it's a meta 1 trick that is banned or frequently picked it will slow your climb but other than that being a 1 trick will make you climb quicker.

How about no, you're wrong :)

You like that :)
